issue.title: www.nexusmods.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.nexusmods.com/devilmaycry5/mods/369?tab=files&category=archived](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fdevilmaycry5%2Fmods%2F369%3Ftab%3Dfiles%26category%3Darchived) ### Comment > AdGuard is being detected by NexusMods. > It seems to be halving the download speed. The message doesn't always show up, strangely. ``` Username: @User-E123 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/493urpfkb3qc8w4g4cw8kko44ogokg0r7wwxb07nzk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.22 System version: | `MacOS 26 Beta` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | `Proton Pass`

### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

5.1.141

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://fbtag.net/`

AdGuard Base filter

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests
